alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne; Rawlins (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 07 at 4:26PM CDT until August 07 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM MDT/445 PM CDT/ FOR NORTHEASTERN CHEYENNE AND NORTHWESTERN RAWLINS COUNTIES IN NORTHWESTERN KANSAS...SOUTHWESTERN HITCHCOCK AND SOUTHEASTERN DUNDY COUNTIES IN SOUTHWESTERN NEBRASKA... At 326 PM MDT/426 PM CDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located 13 miles northeast of McDonald, or 15 miles northwest of Atwood, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Benkelman and Beardsley. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
